Params: {2: 'Broadcast', 3: "Attention! Gestalt's core program has been tampered with. Execute Level 1 protocol!"}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: "Attention! Gestalt's core program has been tampered with. Execute Level 1 protocol!"}
{3: 'The piercing alarm echoes throughout the underground space. Moments later, another alarm sounds and overlaps with it.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'The Punishing concentration is skyrocketing. It is about to breach the warning line!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having experienced a failure before, Watanabe knows that panicking in such moments would lead to unsalvageable loss.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You can't handle the Punishing concentration in here. Evacuate immediately.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nithart', 3: "I'm the Chief's lieutenant. I won't leave.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nithart', 3: '(We must also greet them with victory.)', 4: '2'}
{3: 'For the first time, the voice that has always remained calm in the face of Corrupted attacks sounds a bit anxious.'}
{3: 'Aside from the annoying alarms, the auditory module picks up the sound of metal noises from the tunnels.'}
{3: 'Corrupted from all directions are converging, aiming to devour the prey at the center of the web.'}
{3: 'The sound of metal clashing pierces their ears.'}
{3: 'Watanabe turns and throws his scimitar toward a hidden corner near the connecting pillar.'}
{1: '1', 3: "The scimitar deflects the bullet, swings back into Watanabe's hand, and the squad members immediately fire onto the exposed Corrupted."}
{3: 'Exhaust pipes, wiring conduits, weighing columns... Corrupted are oozing out of every hidden corner like crimson sludge.'}
{3: 'The island is beginning to resist the crashing waves.'}
{3: "Nithart's fingers dance over the terminal, but she is still struggling to fend off the corruption of Gestalt by the unknown virus."}
{2: 'Nithart', 3: '(I did exactly as the Chief instructed... Why is this still happening?)', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nithart', 3: "Chief, are you sure it's okay to leave Gestalt to me?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nithart', 3: 'This is such an important task... Surely there are better candidates...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Every task is important. We believe you are the most suitable candidate.'}
{3: 'Every task is important. We believe you are the most suitable candidate.'}
{2: 'Nithart', 3: "Leaving me here means you likely won't be able to return from the Zero-point Reactor, right?", 4: '1'}
{1: "We don't plan missions based on sacrifice, but we also don't fear sacrifices during missions."}
{3: "We don't plan missions based on sacrifice, but we also don't fear sacrifices during missions."}
{1: 'If Gestalt goes haywire, connect it to this.'}
{3: 'If Gestalt goes haywire, connect it to this.'}
{3: "She has already connected Dominik's data disk to Gestalt, but the firewall is still being breached layer by layer."}
{3: "As the Chief's lieutenant, Nithart has unconditional faith in him."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Believing in those words, she gives up her insistence on following them into the No.1 Reactor contamination zone.'}
{1: 'You are the most suitable candidate. You will complete the mission.'}
{3: 'You are the most suitable candidate. You will complete the mission.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Believing in those words, she abandons her usual conservative methods and chooses the most aggressive approach.'}
{1: 'If Gestalt goes haywire, connect it to this.'}
{3: 'If Gestalt goes haywire, connect it to this.'}
{1: '1', 3: "But she has done everything as instructed and still hasn't succeeded. Is the Chief wrong..."}
{3: 'So... did we make a mistake from the very beginning when we sought Zero-point Energy...'}
{3: 'A violent impact pulls Nithart back to reality.'}
{3: 'The soldier was thrown to the side and broke his legs. Vital fluid is oozing from his wounds, but he still grips his gun tightly, firing bullets into the Corrupted.'}
{3: 'Not far away, the other squad members also suffered varying degrees of injury and are surrounded by the remnants of the Corrupted.'}
{3: 'This island is on the brink of being devoured by the waves.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nithart', 3: 'Time... How much time do I have left?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She took way more time than she promised, yet no one mentioned it, doing their utmost to buy her more time.'}
{3: 'She removes her earpiece and focuses all her energy on thinking.'}
{3: 'She is more familiar with the inner workings of this machine than anyone else. She has iterated it hundreds of times and inspected it tens of thousands of times.'}
{3: 'The code within this machine is essentially an extension of her brain. Now, she just needs to find the source of her headache.'}
{3: 'The scene before her gradually disappears, transforming into a torrent of characters. It is as if each keystroke shatters a rogue serpent.'}
{3: 'The serpents shatter into shards, falling into the depths of the darkness.'}
{3: 'Nithart feels her thoughts racing through even faster, so fast they seem to break free from her body.'}
{2: 'Nithart', 3: '(The targets of these erroneous commands are... No!)', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She finally discovers another threat hidden beneath the Gestalt crisis, sending a shiver down her spine...'}
{3: 'She "reaches out," grasping three delayed commands with her "hand."'}
{3: 'She stretches her hand "outward," not caring if it breaks.'}
{3: 'Watanabe pulls her away from a Corrupted just in time, just before she reaches into its hammering blade.'}
{3: "The Gestalt's broadcast is no longer repeating warnings, and the blinding red has turned into a serene azure."}
{3: 'The only remaining red at the scene is human blood seeping through the protective suits.'}
{3: "Watanabe's blade severs a Corrupted lunging at them, and Watanabe kicks it into a pile of debris."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You've successfully restored Gestalt. Your job is done...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Nithart tries to stand but quickly falls to the ground, making a noise that sounds like a water balloon hitting the floor.'}
{3: 'She wants to walk, but her body feels like it is soaked in viscous fluid. It is actually her own blood and flesh.'}
{3: 'She tries to crawl but realizes she has no strength left.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Hang in there. We'll break through together with you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nithart', 3: "No... I can't leave yet. Restoring Gestalt is only one thing...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nithart', 3: 'The targets of the erroneous commands are the troops in space!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With the Gestalt chaos resolved, communication with the temporary command post seems to have been restored.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Gestalt is back to normal, but we're surrounded. Nithart is severely infected, with large areas of necrosis.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: 'Hold on, backups are on the way!', 4: '13'}
